translations: n.美利奴羊（原产于西班牙）；美利奴丝绸；美利奴呢绒

sentences.sentence: I go over with Merino, arriving at eight fifty-three.
sentences.translation: 我跟梅利诺一起过来的，在八点五十三分到达。

sentences.sentence: Mr Merino insists the earthquake will have no effect. Others disagree.
sentences.translation: 梅里诺先生声称地震对其无影响，其他人持相反观点。
